description: Element container for Student Veteran Benefits Data

validation.validation: The value for Parent on Active Duty should be false unless the Military Status for Benefits is equal to Child.
The value for Eligible for Post 9/11 GI Bill should be false unless the Veteran Benefits /Bill is equal to Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment Bill.
The value for Spouse on Active Duty should be false unless the Military Status for Benefits is equal to Spouse.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.
